name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SEO Tool Extension: Meta + SEO Checker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SEO Analysis, SEO Keyword Research and Content Optimization SEO Site Tools. Meta Tags Checker, SEO Title & SEO Keyword Optimizer

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As an SEO you live in a sea of open tabs. SEO Tool Extension was initially developed to allow you fast access to your favourite SEO Tools to quickly find reports on the page you're browsing, but now it offers so much more.

# Analyze each page's on page SEO

Our instant on-page SEO Checker helps you quickly analyze a page's title and meta tags, including meta description, robots and canonicals. We provide a fast way to check onpage SEO factors: a page's word count, the headings and subheadings in use and a fast analysis of the most popular keywords and phrases used on the page.

This addon's onpage checks include:
    - Internal and external links, with a simple CSV export
    - SEO Title and meta tag checker and SERP snippet previews
    - <h> header tag analysis, with filtering and export of H1, H2, H3 and H4 tags
    - Keyword usage report, showing how frequently terms are used on a page and even the keyword density, if you like that sort of thing
    - At a glance view of robots directives, hreflang and canonical tags
    - A full break down of meta tags on the page, including Opengraph tags used for Twitter and Facebook preview links

# Preview SERP snippets and optimize your titles and descriptions for better SEO rankings

Use the 'SERP Preview' tab to see how your page will look in Google's search results. Using the latest snippet design based on Google's results in 2020, you get the best idea of how your site will appear including featured snippets, rich results and other SERP elements. Optimize your titles for better organic SEO clickthrough rate, or aim to rank for more long tail keywords.

Use the title and meta description tag generator to quickly paste your optimized snippet into your HTML HEAD.

# Access your favourite SEO Tools at a click

Need to explore a wider range of data points? Install this plugin for instant access to metrics from backlink tools such as Ahrefs, Majestic, Moz and Semrush. You can also check content performance at Buzzsumo, Similarweb and Siteline, analyze pagespeed, structured data and mobile friendly scores from Google's tools or jump straight into the Internet Archive's Wayback Machine metrics or Google Cache to see a site's history.

# Built in Keyword Research Tool

Using Scout Suggest, our free SEO keyword suggestions generator, you can quickly check for keyword variations, questions and prepositions without leaving the page you're on. Do your research wherever inspiration strikes - you can even grab the autocomplete suggestions from your browser without leaving your 'Edit Post' screen. It's like having Ubersuggest or Answer The Public at hand on your browser's toolbar - only with even more unique variations and suggestions for better long tail seo rankings.

# About The SEO Scout Chrome SEO Tool Extension
This free plugin and seo checker helps you audit, analyze and optimize your pages and competing sites is brought to you by SEO Scout.com

SEO Scout.com offer a suite of SEO tools to help you improve your search engine rankings. These include keyword rank tracking, to assist in boosting your performance in the SERPs, as well as a content optimizer, which combines deep keyword research with an advanced entity-based analysis of your competitor's sites, helping you edit and optimize your content for improved SEO results. By using our topic based SEO analysis of a SERP you can add depth and context to your articles to improve content quality and help them rank higher. 

We give each article an SEO score for completeness so you can compare your content against the competition, and optimize for better rankings. We also suggest a wide range of question keywords from People Also Ask, Quora and Google Suggest so you can answer your customer's questions and claim featured snippets.

Our competitive resarch tools allow you to see the most profitable keywords other sites are ranking for, suggesting new topics to blog about. The SEO Testing tools help you optimize your titles and meta description for improved organic CTR and long tail rankings, while our missing keywords tool help compare your content to its keyword rankings in Google Search Console, so you can adjust and optimze your content to cover more long tail seo keyword rankings in the SERPs.
